name: Fixed Asset Rentals (FAR)
description: Comprehensive rental asset lifecycle management solution that bridges NetSuite Fixed Asset Management with serialized inventory tracking. Automates bottle tracking, equipment rentals, and returnable asset management with real-time inventory synchronization, customer assignment tracking, and automated disposal processing. Prevents double-booking of rental assets while maintaining detailed audit trails across multi-subsidiary operations.

constraints.value: Fixed Asset Management, Multi-Location Inventory, Server-Side Scripting
